attributeContains.description: Checks if the given attribute of an element contains the expected value

attributeEquals.description: Checks if the given attribute of an element has the expected value

containsText.description: Checks if the given element contains the specified text

cssClassPresent.description: Checks if the given element has the specified CSS class

cssClassNotPresent.description: Checks if the given element does not have the specified CSS class

cssProperty.description: Checks if the specified css property of a given element has the expected value

elementPresent.description: Checks if the given element exists in the DOM

elementNotPresent.description: Checks if the given element does not exist in the DOM

hidden.description: Checks if the given element is not visible on the page

title.description: Checks if the page title equals the given value

urlContains.description: Checks if the current URL contains the given value

urlEquals.description: Checks if the current url equals the given value

value.description: Checks if the given form element's value equals the expected value

valueContains.description: Checks if the given form element's value contains the expected value

visible.description: Checks if the given element is visible on the page

waitForElementNotPresent.description: Waits a given time in milliseconds (default 5000ms) for an element to be not present

waitForElementNotVisible.description: Waits a given time in milliseconds (default 5000ms) for an element to be not visible

waitForElementPresent.description: Waits a given time in milliseconds (default 5000ms) for an element to be present in the page

waitForElementVisible.description: Waits a given time in milliseconds (default 5000ms) for an element to be visible in the page

element.description: Search for an element on the page, starting from the document root

elements.description: Search for an element on the page, starting from the document root

elementIdEquals.description: Test if two web element IDs refer to the same DOM element

elementIdElement.description: Search for an element on the page, starting from the identified element

elementIdElements.description: Search for multiple elements on the page, starting from the identified element

click.description: Simulates a click event on the given DOM element

clearValue.description: Clear a textarea or a text input element's value

moveToElement.description: Move the mouse by an offset of the specified element

setValue.description: Sends some text to an element

keys.description: Send a sequence of key strokes to the active element

getAttribute.description: Retrieve the value of an attribute for a given DOM element

getCssProperty.description: Retrieve the value of a css property for a given DOM element

getElementSize.description: Determine an element's size in pixels

getTagName.description: Query for an element's tag name

getText.description: Returns the visible text for the element

getValue.description: Returns a form element current value

isVisible.description: Determine if an element is currently displayed

elementActive.description: Get the element on the page that currently has focus

getLocation.description: Determine an element's location on the page

getLocationInView.description: Determine an element's location on the screen once it has been scrolled into view

elementIdAttribute.description: Get the value of an element's attribute

elementIdCssProperty.description: Retrieve the computed value of the given CSS property of the given element

elementIdClear.description: Attempts to clear its value, reset the checked state, or text content

elementIdClick.description: Scrolls into view the element and clicks the in-view center point

elementIdDisplayed.description: Determine if an element is currently displayed

elementIdEnabled.description: Determine if an element is currently enabled

elementIdLocationInView.description: Determine an element's location on the screen once it has been scrolled into view

elementIdLocation.description: Determine an element's location on the page

elementIdName.description: Retrieve the qualified tag name of the given element

elementIdSelected.description: Determine if an OPTION element, or an INPUT element of type checkbox or radio button is currently selected

elementIdSize.description: Determine an element's size in pixels

elementIdText.description: Returns the visible text for the element

elementIdValue.description: sends the provided keys to the element, or returns the current value of the element

injectScript.description: command to load an external script into the page specified by url

execute.description: Inject a snippet of synchronous JavaScript into the page for execution in the context of the currently selected frame

executeAsync.description: Inject a snippet of asynchronous JavaScript into the page for execution in the context of the currently selected frame

source.description: Returns a string serialisation of the DOM of the current page

isLogAvailable.description: Utility command to test if the log type is available

session.description: Get info about, delete or create a new session. Defaults to the current session

sessions.description: Returns a list of the currently active sessions

timeouts.description: Configure the amount of time that a particular type of operation can execute for before they are aborted

timeoutsAsyncScript.description: Set the amount of time, in milliseconds, that asynchronous scripts executed by .executeAsync are permitted to run

timeoutsImplicitWait.description: Set the amount of time the driver should wait when searching for elements

sessionLog.description: Gets the text of the log type specified

sessionLogTypes.description: Gets an array of strings for which log types are available

init.description: Performs a call to .url() with passing the value of launch_url field from the settings file

getTitle.description: Returns the title of the current page. Uses title protocol command

urlHash.description: Convenience command that adds the specified hash

url.description: Retrieve the URL of the current page or navigate to a new URL

back.description: Navigate backwards in the browser history, if possible

forward.description: Navigate forwards in the browser history, if possible

window.description: Change focus to another window or close the current window

windowHandles.description: Retrieve the list of all window handles available to the session

windowMaximize.description: Increases the window to the maximum available size without going full-screen

windowPosition.description: Change or get the position of the specified window

windowSize.description: Change or get the size of the specified window

frame.description: Change focus to another frame on the page

frameParent.description: Change focus to the parent context

getCookies.description: Retrieve all cookies visible to the current page

getCookie.description: Retrieve a single cookie visible to the current page

setCookie.description: Set a cookie, specified as a cookie JSON object

deleteCookie.description: Delete the cookie with the given name

deleteCookies.description: Delete all cookies visible to the current page

cookie.description: Retrieve or delete all cookies visible to the current page or set a cookie

doubleClick.description: Double-clicks at the current mouse coordinates

mouseButtonClick.description: Click at the current mouse coordinates

mouseButtonDown.description: Click and hold the left mouse button

mouseButtonUp.description: Releases the mouse button previously held

moveTo.description: Move the mouse by an offset of the specified Web Element ID or relative to the current mouse cursor

acceptAlert.description: Accepts the currently displayed alert dialog

dismissAlert.description: Dismisses the currently displayed alert dialog

getAlertText.description: Gets the text of the currently displayed JavaScript alert(), confirm(), or prompt() dialog

setAlertText.description: Sends keystrokes to a JavaScript prompt() dialog

saveScreenshot.description: Take a screenshot of the current page and saves it as the given filename

screenshot.description: Take a screenshot of the current page

contexts.description: Get a list of the available contexts
